sentence.Network_en: Farmers thresh grain with threshing machines.
Nowadays most farmers use a machine to thresh their wheat.

sentence.Network_en: A firewall screen is all thresh to our datum.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English therscan, later threscan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch dorsen and German dreschen. Compare with thrash

entry.tran: 给(玉米、小麦、水稻等)脱粒;打谷
entry.def: When a cereal such as corn, wheat, or rice is threshed, it is beaten in order to separate the grains from the rest of the plant.

example.ex: The corn was still sown, cut and threshed as it was a hundred years ago.
example.tran: 玉米的播种、收割、脱粒方法还和一百年前一样。

sentences.sentence: "The feverish patient thrashed around in his bed"

means.word_mean: 2. move like a flail; thresh about;
3. beat the seeds out of a grain
4. give a thrashing to; beat hard

sentences.en: Farmers thresh grain with threshing machines.
